channel.title: Flank
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt]Information of me and the server[/size][/center] Hello everyone, This is my first server to ever "showoff" so don't bash on me. Anyway, the source I am going to use is [b]Phoenix[/b] by [b]Vix[/b] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657971.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657971.0.html[/url]. I will be making a remake on the skills but once I get done with most skills, I will be turning over to making something hopefully cool out of this source. The revision is 317 with the oldschool style look. This server is protocol programmed and I will stick with going with the moparisthebest 317 protocol information (might use the runescape.wiki sometimes). I am not a very experienced Java programmer so don't expect good code.[i] I will be working on this by my own.[/i]
Here is the git: https://github.com/Bl3nd/Flank
[center][size=12pt]Media[/size][/center]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img703/8149/d3pk.png[/img]
Thieving: [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img203/2439/lupi.png[/img]
Private messaging before: [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img198/6452/dm9o.png[/img]
after: [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img690/2663/uusf.png[/img]
Woodcutting: [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img837/4627/kf2q.png[/img]
[center][size=12pt]Updates:[/size][/center]
[code]January 29, 2014 - Added basic thieving January 29, 2014 - Fixed private messaging bug January 30, 2014 - Added the appearance interface to pop up the first time you log in[/code]
[code]February 2, 2014: Added some npcs to Thieving February 3, 2014: Added basic Woodcutting, only added Normal just for testing (will add more)![/code]

item.title: Flank
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

[center][size=12pt]Information of me and the server[/size][/center]
Hello everyone,
This is my first server to ever “showoff” so don’t bash on me. Anyway, the source I am going to use is Phoenix by Vix https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657971.0.html. I will be making a remake on the skills but once I get done with most skills, I will be turning over to making something hopefully cool out of this source. The revision is 317 with the oldschool style look. This server is protocol programmed and I will stick with going with the moparisthebest 317 protocol information (might use the runescape.wiki sometimes). I am not a very experienced Java programmer so don’t expect good code. I will be working on this by my own.

Here is the git: https://github.com/Bl3nd/Flank
